page.title: 15HOUSING AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: WE FOUND THAT MOST PEOPLE IN OUR AREA HAVE MODERN HOUSES.EVEN THOUGH ONLY A FEW OWN OLD ONES,OLD HOUSES ARE BY FAR THE MOST PREFERED.MOST PEOPLE MOVED TO BYFIELD BECAUSE THEY LIKED THE AREA, WHILST SOME SIMPLY CAME WITH THEIR FAMILIES AND A FEW BECAUSE OF THEIR JOBS.ANY MORE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT IN BYFIELD IS UNPOPULAR IN THE VILLAGE. ONLY ONE PERSON OUT OF THE 16 THAT WE ASKED THOUGHT THERE SHOULD BE ANY. FINALLY WE ASKED PEOPLE WHAT THEY THOUGHT OF MODERN HOUSING ESTATES.THEY WERE NOT VERY POPULAR AND SOME THOUGHT THAT THEY WERE UNIMAGINATIVE.THE PARISH OF BODDINGTON,DIVIDED INTO 2 VILLAGES, UPPER AND LOWER,CONSISTS OF ABOUT 250 HOUSES IN A WIDE VARIETY OF STYLES. THE PRESENT POLICY OF ALLOWING IN-FILLING WITHIN THE VILLAGES HAS PRODUCED A RAPID BOOM IN BUILDING BRINGING IN MANY NEW RESIDENTS.
